title: Marriage, A Three RING Circus
body_text:
They've signed the dotted line and on the 19th day of May, 2012, they walk hand-in-hand down the aisle of love. But before that happens, pent-up anger, frustration, all the dirty laundry will be aired for the public to witness. Trust that it won't be pretty!
❤ East Coast Dodgeball "FATAL ATTRACTION" ❤
May 12, 2012 ❤ 5:30 PM
Special
CREAMation
Stipulation!
Relationship Status: Single?
Of the five romantic duos previously featured in an
ECD
-exclusive contest, only two are still together. Regardless of the outcome, let's hope Lima and Adams have it in their hearts to forgive one another post-FATAL ATTRACTION.
Who's on Top, Who's on Bottom?
The
ECDElite
Hall of Famer Adams has all the credentials and experience needed to overcome his opposition. Paper favorite? Probably, but don't let Lima's mere one-year tenure fool you; the reigning
HitTheHuman Contest
Champion has proven her accuracy to be atop the ranks.
CREAMation
Rules, Really?
Hey, they both gladly accepted the terms and conditions of the match. Now it's just a matter of time before the 11th
CREAMation
embraces its victim.
Fatal Farewell?
No matter the end result, plans to live in peaceful harmony have carefully been drawn out. Come August 2012, it may be a long time before either Lima or Adams ever step foot on the
ECD
battleground again. Attendance at this truly once-in-a-lifetime showdown is expected.
To Joanice Lima and Christopher Adams,
ECD
wishes you the best!
________________________________________
______________________
Couples &
CREAMation
Match History
DODGEBALL CX
| November 3, 2007
Famously billed as the inaugural "Couples Challenge",
ECD's
massive 110th presentation featured the recognized pairs of Michael Butler and Alison Bertsch against Michael "Sputz" Krott and Melissa Kerr. The enormity, intensity, and tension of the bout may have been too heavy to handle; all combatants have since gone their separate ways.
DIVORCE COURT
| October 16, 2010
This nail-biting 3-on-3
CREAMation
war had all the makings of a classic when Ryan Rafferty, Ashley Hoppe, and Dan Spengeman narrowly defeated Julia Dennebaum, Michael Edwards, and Michelle Mullins. Despite the casualty-ridden massacre, thankfully the Rafferty-Dennebaum and Spengeman-Mullins partnerships remain in existence some 19 months later.
CREAMation
Videos
There have been 10 of these sticky events and each has been unique in their own way. From Cornero, Tronolone, and Letsche to Fitzpatrick, Winston, and Edwards, the list of those "blinded by the white" will soon add one more.
body_html:
They've signed the dotted line and on the 19th day of May, 2012, they walk hand-in-hand down the aisle of love. But before that happens, pent-up anger, frustration, all the dirty laundry will be aired for the public to witness. Trust that it won't be pretty!

❤ East Coast Dodgeball "FATAL ATTRACTION" ❤
May 12, 2012 ❤ 5:30 PM
Special CREAMation Stipulation!


Relationship Status: Single?
Of the five romantic duos previously featured in an ECD-exclusive contest, only two are still together. Regardless of the outcome, let's hope Lima and Adams have it in their hearts to forgive one another post-FATAL ATTRACTION.

Who's on Top, Who's on Bottom?
The ECDElite Hall of Famer Adams has all the credentials and experience needed to overcome his opposition. Paper favorite? Probably, but don't let Lima's mere one-year tenure fool you; the reigning HitTheHuman Contest Champion has proven her accuracy to be atop the ranks.

CREAMation Rules, Really?
Hey, they both gladly accepted the terms and conditions of the match. Now it's just a matter of time before the 11th CREAMation embraces its victim.

Fatal Farewell?
No matter the end result, plans to live in peaceful harmony have carefully been drawn out. Come August 2012, it may be a long time before either Lima or Adams ever step foot on the ECD battleground again. Attendance at this truly once-in-a-lifetime showdown is expected.

To Joanice Lima and Christopher Adams, ECD wishes you the best!

______________________________________________________________


Couples & CREAMation Match History

DODGEBALL CX | November 3, 2007
Famously billed as the inaugural "Couples Challenge", ECD's massive 110th presentation featured the recognized pairs of Michael Butler and Alison Bertsch against Michael "Sputz" Krott and Melissa Kerr. The enormity, intensity, and tension of the bout may have been too heavy to handle; all combatants have since gone their separate ways.

DIVORCE COURT | October 16, 2010
This nail-biting 3-on-3 CREAMation war had all the makings of a classic when Ryan Rafferty, Ashley Hoppe, and Dan Spengeman narrowly defeated Julia Dennebaum, Michael Edwards, and Michelle Mullins. Despite the casualty-ridden massacre, thankfully the Rafferty-Dennebaum and Spengeman-Mullins partnerships remain in existence some 19 months later.

CREAMation Videos
There have been 10 of these sticky events and each has been unique in their own way. From Cornero, Tronolone, and Letsche to Fitzpatrick, Winston, and Edwards, the list of those "blinded by the white" will soon add one more.
